rows.label: qev075204_MSG0001
rows.name:
The Hundred Hellions' fighting style was passed down
from parent to child. My life was an endless string of
training from the moment my master took me in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075204_MSG0002
rows.name:
And the day he stepped down from active duty,
I inherited this sword as proof I was a Hellion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075204_MSG0003
rows.name: But I aim to prove that I am not done learning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075204_MSG0004
rows.name:
I refuse to bring shame to my masterâ€”nay, my
grandfather. He who raised me with so much care.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075204_MSG0005
rows.name:
I shall be waiting for you deeper in the woods.
Come ready to settle this match.[ST:wait ]
